main event: An observer in North Carolina witnessed a luminous object in the sky during a clear moonlit night, which appeared to be suspended and then moved off at a high rate of speed.
interesting points: The object was described as having a blue color on top and white underneath the sides.,The observer reported that the object made a sound similar to an airplane but without the usual engine noise.,The object moved behind clouds and trees during the sighting.,There were two Polaroid prints of the object included in the report which were described as having poor quality.,The observer estimated the speed of the object to be over 100 mph and its distance away to be about 1/4 mile.
witness description: An unnamed individual who submitted a UFO report form.
